summary:
I always imagined writing a post with this title while lounging in a fancy place, like a cozy flat with a crackling fireplace, or maybe on a beach with the sound of waves in the background.  Instead, here I am, sitting at my desk in front of my computer, reflecting on what turned out to be one of the happiest 12 months of my life. 
My name is Adam, and last year I did something both terrifying and exciting â€“ I quit my job at Netguru...
title: A year away: lessons from 12 months of just living

summary:
AWS re:Invent 2024
I spent most of the week in Las Vegas for the annual AWS re:Invent conference.  I was there with several work colleagues and I enjoyed spending time with them outside the office.  The conference itself was a whirlwind of activity, and as an introvert being around 60,000 other attendees was a bit overwhelming at times...
title: It was mostly about re:Invent (Weeknotes #24-49)
